website_summaries.verdict: The best value for your money. Offers high-end features at a budget price.
pros: Rugged design and durability for a value price
We love that they have steel toes and shock-absorbing soles on par with much more costly boots
cons: Somewhat heavier and bulkier than other brands

customer_reviews.title: Less than 6 months, falling apart
customer_reviews.text: First thing I noticed these are way too large for the size. I got the same size as other coastal boots I own and these are huge. There is no ankle support whatsoever. After a month or so the boots started falling apart and cracking. Then all the lace holes started rusting. Less than 6 months and these boots were done. I’ve had other boot brands last me 2-3 years. I’d hoped for 1-2 years out of these. After 3 months it was noticeable they weren’t holding up. And less than 6 months and they were virtually unusable. I’ve had other boots from Coastal that were good products. These are not one of them. Wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Well made boots.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these boots for my husband. He cleans and details floors for local companies. As he works with chemicals, to strip the wax from the floors, that practically destroys everything it comes in contact with, we needed something sturdy, slip and chemical resistant. These boots are made very well and last him longer than any other steal-toed boot we've ever tried without spending an arm and a leg. He says they fit perfectly and are very comfortable when he's working.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Ruge

customer_reviews.title: Nice, well-made steel toe boot
customer_reviews.text: These are replacing a worn out pair of Dickies steel toe work boots of a very similar style. Boyfriend was happy with the additional choices on Amazon compared to Walmart where he purchased the last pair. Since it was the same brand, we were comfortable about ordering online and getting the same size. The treads on these are a hiking boot style, whereas his last pair was more a horizontal bar tread, but he didn't mind that much.
customer_reviews.author: LoveBlissSatsang

customer_reviews.title: Not really worth the price
customer_reviews.text: They fit very well, but they claim to be slip and oil resistant and they aren't. They also leave black streaks all over the floor. Both things prevent me from using them at work, which is the reason I bought them in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy, heavy duty steel toed work boot
customer_reviews.text: They're comfortable, took about a week to break them in. Nice and sturdy, and if they're like all of the other Dickie's boots I have owned, they'll last for quite a while (I typically get about 3 years of use from a pair of Dickie's boots, and I put about 5 miles a day on them at work). The only thing that I didn't like is that it has lace eyelets all the way up and not the lace hooks like some of their other styles of boots, so it takes a little longer to lace them up, but that really is not that big of a deal.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Daily II

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: The boots are great if you don't do much walking, otherwise inserts are a must. They rub on my ankles, gave me some nice blisters the first week. The tongue of the boot slides over to the side so then you are stuck with your socks getting dirty if you aren't wearing extra long pants, and then the laces rub weird as well. All in all not the greatest pair of boots, but I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Borup

customer_reviews.title: I WOULD BUY THEM AGAIN
customer_reviews.text: I AM A PLASTERING/STUCCO CONTRACTOR CLIMBING LADDERS, WALKING ON DEBRIS ON THE FLOOR, AND IN THE SHORT TIME I HAVE WORN THEM THEY HAVE HELPED MY FEET.
customer_reviews.author: George E. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy For The Price
customer_reviews.text: Initial impression is these boots are pretty sturdy for the price. I did add gel insoles and with the insoles they are pretty comfortable. The tongue is noticeably thinner than most work boots I've had. While other reviews mention this as an issue (slipping, etc.), I don't find it to be a problem. In fact I feel the thinner tongue has made the boots easier to break in. There are definitely better boots out there but for the price, can't go wrong with these.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Steel Toe
customer_reviews.text: Surprise gift for my son FINALLY getting back to work after this COVID crisis and he LOVES them!! The quality is perfect and he could not have been happier !
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Mcphee

customer_reviews.title: Rubber collars disintegrating after five months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a pair of these five months ago, and I just noticed the rubber collars on both shoes are starting to disintegrate. Otherwise, they are fine.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not as nice, in terms of comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: Not as nice, in terms of comfortable fit, as something more expensive, but works fine for what I needed, which was to just tromp around in the woods occasionally. Don't get me wrong, they're comfortable enough, just not real form fitting which would have cost more money. Well built though and have no real complaints. They are what they are and fit the purpose for which I bought them. Maybe a second pair of socks would help. There's enough room, but we'll see.
customer_reviews.author: da walker

customer_reviews.title: Safe, great value, not comfy.
customer_reviews.text: The boots are a great value for the money, but infant say they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: A.E. Samaan

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Overall the boots are decent. These safety toe version are not a comfortable as the standard, but none are. I always put some gel inserts in my work boots to help the sore feet. I do not like the changed to the upper lace holes. The simple grommet hole is perfect. The metal triangle loops tear up your laces. I broke the original set in a week.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Detroit

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad boot, overall. Not super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Insole very uncomfortable. Boot itself is a fairly good quality but the insoles are awful. I had to buy my own insoles to replace the original ones.
customer_reviews.author: KerryG

customer_reviews.title: ... does landscaping and i bought these for him he loved them but they are ripping waaay to fast i ...
customer_reviews.text: my boyfriend does landscaping and i bought these for him he loved them but they are ripping waaay to fast i thought they were for work not just for fashion

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME and nice
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE WORK BOOTS hubby had them for almost a year their now showing wear and tear It's time to re-order

customer_reviews.title: Always good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great boots. Dickies boots fit me well. Very comfortable all day long
customer_reviews.author: Dooreo

customer_reviews.title: Good, sturdy work boots.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent support and protection. Should last a long time under heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: RDW

customer_reviews.title: Functional and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I had to rely on these boots as my only footwear for almost two years. Despite falling apart from using them for work and everyday, they served a notable purpose. If you're looking for a cheap, basic and comfortable steel toed work boot, these are a fantastic choice.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: The fit for me is excellent, and the all leather uppers take polish well
customer_reviews.text: I have an all day stand up job, on my feet ten hours a day. The fit for me is excellent, and the all leather uppers take polish well. My only "quibble" is there is no lace strap on the tongue to keep it from shifting around. But when I need another pair, I won't hesitate to order these again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Shiplett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The boots have already fallen apart the soles have half way come off on one of the boots!! Haven't had them 90 days amazon replaced them with a 2nd pair and sadden to say they have fallen apart again as well. Do not recommend these boots!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Boot
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to boot. I've used them for years.
customer_reviews.author: RSR

customer_reviews.title: Material quality lacking
customer_reviews.text: Look great not as durable as I would have expected from Dickies
customer_reviews.author: hp

customer_reviews.title: Good boot for the money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent boot for the money. Hard use and you’ll possibly need two pairs to get through a year. I had to get a half size bigger thanUsual just FYI
customer_reviews.author: James Heffner

customer_reviews.title: boots
customer_reviews.text: Fits exactly as described heavy duty and keeps my feet warm

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable boots
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these boots. Perfect fit as i like my boots loose and comfortable. No painful break in. High qaulity. Will purchase again in the future.

customer_reviews.title: Great $54 boot
customer_reviews.text: PAID $53.99 been wearing them 5 days a week for nearly 3 months. quality has held up thus far impressed after 3 months of use. at $53.99 I would buy again

customer_reviews.title: Love my boots
customer_reviews.text: Love my boots! The toe box is a little on the big side, but all in all they are great after being broken in!

customer_reviews.text: Seems wider than other brands I wear. Laces do not tighten as much as I'd like. Thin tongue is flexible and does not rub which is a plus

customer_reviews.title: They did wear out way to soon. Didnt have ...

customer_reviews.text: Since my teenage son graduated from his standard shoe, converse high tops these are the only shoes he wears. He is very hard on his shoes, every 6-9 months I just order a new pair of these.

customer_reviews.text: I'm pleased altogether. Great price feels like a pretty good fit also.

customer_reviews.text: I bought a size too big because wasn't sure of how it fits. i gave it to my brother in law after a couple uses and he loves it

customer_reviews.title: they're super nice and came super fast
customer_reviews.text: I bought the boots for my boyfriend for work, they're super nice and came super fast. he really likes them and hopefully they last!

customer_reviews.text: Hard to tell. Appeared to be a good boot, but did not wear due to being narrow and too small for my use.

customer_reviews.text: I needed some steel toe boots, never know when Toyoda will call. I can keep these in my trunk ready whenever.

customer_reviews.text: Good boots , take a bit to break in though Decent price.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: A solid pair of work boots. They fit perfectly, and are great for the outdoors. Great brand, even better that this purchase supports a small, family-owned business. Couldn't be happier with this purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: Confortable
customer_reviews.text: These boots fit very confortably. Bought them for my son, he wears a size 13 and sometimes he has a hard time finding shoes in his size. The boots are not stiff and they did not need to be broken into.

customer_reviews.title: He is really happy with them especially because they keep his feet dry
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my grandson. He is really happy with them especially because they keep his feet dry.

customer_reviews.title: Good boots at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: I really love these boots.I'm still breaking them in even as I write this review, but I have a feeling that they are going to be with me for some time to come.They are a little narrow but I couldn't get them as a wide which is not the fault of Amazon, and I am happy I could get them for less than $100.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was a little small on the right foot but other then that they are great

customer_reviews.title: Dickies work shoes
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son who is very hard on shoes and he reports they are a true fit and comfortable. In addition, they are reasonably priced and wear well.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I got these when the price dipped down to $30, and I couldn't be happier. They're sturdy, warm, waterproof, and comfortable, even for long periods standing on concrete.

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!!!

customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my boyfriend for Christmas and he loves them. He is a horticulturist and works outside all day in landscaping and these boots have held up great. He says he likes these just as much as his Timberland Pros that he had before. Great price and came on time, would recommend.

product_meta.title: Dickies Men's Raider Steel-Toe Work Shoe
product_meta.description:
Dickies has been making tough-as-nails work wear for over 80 years and we think they're on to something. The Raider work shoe provides excellent protection on and off the job. Constructed with a steel toe and an electrical hazard-rated outsole, this leather lace-up is lined with a moisture-wicking fabric that'll keep you cool on the go, and the above ankle height, complete with nicely padded collar, supplies added protection and support. Plus, the memory foam insole cushions from morning till night.

For 86 Years, Dickies is a preferred brand for all generations and cultures. This is a brand that works as hard as it plays.
feature_bullets: Work boot with speed-lacing hardware featuring quilted collar and PU insole
